ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Henrik Holm  To:  Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 11:04 PM Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message ... gave ...
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Henrik Holm <HEH@...>
To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 30, 2001 11:04 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message


> Ups returned to work and saw 25 messages in the bards list.. Thought they
> REALLY did screw something up.. And then it was my little bad joke that
gave
> reason to some of these messages ;)
> Btw. Ive been playing my bard since april 2 1999. So he must qualify as an
> old bard, hehe. Im just a casual player so Im still only 48th level, but
Ive
> been on this list for a loonnnnggg time. I remember when the guy from
verant
> and the tester roamed around. Those where the days with lots of good info
> and communications bards around norrath, forgotten their names though.
>
> Musiker, bertox
>

J. M. Capozzi, I saw his name recently, he's part of the live team on
Luclin. (He wasn't with Verant officially when he posted to this list,
but had some inside dope.)

Probably thinking of John Kim as well, he runs pretty rigorous tests.
He's still on the Concert Hall, last I checked.
